sub_title: Senior Geology Domain Expert & Focal Point for WRFM & Digital Products
summary:
SKILLS

Business
- Geology (brown- & greenfields, unconvs, ops, WRFM, apprailsal, HC mat. & PRA)
Leading: multi-discipl. project teams; software dev. projects; integr. geo dom knowledge with ML based digital products

Technical
- Mastery: sediment. & SeqStrat
- Skilled in res. charact. & core eval. to prep. for history matching;
- (Un-)consolidated coring
- Unconventionals (PG lead) - shale gas & light tight oil
- WRFM expert
- Softw. Dev. Processes & Techn. Inputs (SCRUM, Agile, PO)
- Skilled in SI & 3D modeling
- Ops Geology

Leadership
- Experienced leading a team of surface & sub-surface staff
- Experienced in organizing learning events & acting as lecturer & mentor
- Skilled in conducting core workshops

Team work 
- Eager, constructive contributor demonstrating enthusiasm & confidence in own work
- Keen to share expertise & seek support
- Aiming for “fit-for-purpose” deliveries
- Skilled to work independently &/or in integrated teams

--------------------

Further Technical

Reservoir Characterization
- Integrating reg. geology & seqstrat as basis for static modeling
- Res. corr based on rock data, petrophysics & seqstrat
- Designing integrated subsurf. workflows 

Static Reservoir Modeling
- Setting up conceptual geo-models
- Flow unit & pay area ident. (3D modeling)
- In-place vol

Prod & Operation Geology
- Evaluating geo-prospect data
- PG for well proposals;
- Ops PG for offshore HP gas wells & onshore infill oil wells
- Tools for Unconventionals producibility assessment
- Development of WRFM workflow


--------------------

Exceptional presentation skills
-  Adjudged by project leads: “except. talent to convey intricate facts in catchy explanations”
-  Talks to NOCs, at conferences, management & peers; guide in nat. sc.museum

Soft Skills
- Excellent understanding of integrated project needs 
- Eagerness to acquire new capabilities
- Hi-qual results on time due to structured work plans
- Being open/sensitive to other backgrounds & cultures
